title: BRIEF-Indusind Bank: Exposure to Large HFC at 0.35% Of Loan Book
text:
BRIEF-Indusind Bank: Exposure to Large HFC at 0.35% Of Loan Book

Stock Markets 48 minutes ago (Sep 30, 2019 15:50)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Indusind Bank: Exposure to Large HFC at 0.35% Of Loan Book Sept 30 (Reuters) - Indusind Bank Ltd : * AS OF SEPTEMBER 29TH 2019 CLOSING, BANK'S GROSS EXPOSURE TO HFC, ITS SUBSIDIARIES STANDS AT 0.35% OF THE LOAN BOOK * EXPOSURE IS FULLY / STRONGLY COLLATERALISED WITH NO OVERDUES * GROUP ALSO MAINTAINS EQUAL OR HIGHER AMOUNTS OF UNPLEDGED FIXED DEPOSITS WITH BANK

BRIEF-Indusind Bank: Exposure to Large HFC at 0.35% Of Loan Book
description: BRIEF-Indusind Bank: Exposure to Large HFC at 0.35% Of Loan Book
